content.en: Hazardous material transportation: Researchers have been exploring ways to optimize the transportation of hazardous materials to minimize potential risks and costs. They have developed various algorithms, such as the Spiess and Florian algorithm, improved dynamic programming method, and multi-objective routing programming model, to determine the optimal routes and schedules for transporting hazardous materials. These algorithms take into account factors like transportation costs, adverse consequences, capacity selection, and uncertainty, and aim to minimize individual vehicle risk and maintain risk equity.
content.da: Transport af farligt gods: Forskere har undersøgt måder at optimere transporten af farligt gods for at minimere potentielle risici og omkostninger. De har udviklet forskellige algoritmer, såsom Spiess og Florian-algoritmen, forbedret dynamisk programmeringsmetode og en flerobjektiv ruteprogrammeringsmodel, for at bestemme de optimale ruter og tidsplaner for transport af farligt gods. Disse algoritmer tager hensyn til faktorer som transportomkostninger, negative konsekvenser, kapacitetsvalg og usikkerhed, og har til formål at minimere individuel køretøjsrisiko og opretholde risiko ligestilling.
